text: Bakhmut () is a rural locality (a selo) and the administrative center of Bakhmutsky Selsoviet, Kuyurgazinsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 618 as of 2010. There are 5 streets. == Geography == It is located 12 km from Yermolayevo. == References == Category:Rural localities in Kuyurgazinsky District
title: Bakhmut, Republic of Bashkortostan
